Package panels

Class Summary
BackgroundPanel The class BackgroundPanel represents the background of the main menu.
DifficultyPanel The class DifficultyPanel represents the difficulty menu which extends from the main menu of the game.
EscapeMenuPanel The class MainMenuPanel represents the main menu of the Bomberman game.
GraphicalPanel The class GraphicalPanel represents the basic panel used by the other classes in the Panels package.
HighscorePanel The class HighscorePanel represents the High scores list.
InGamePanel The class inGamePanel represents the panel of the main game.
InstructionsBg The class InstructionsBg represents the instructions menu of the game.
InstructionsPanel The class InstructionsPanel represents the instructions menu of the game.
MainMenuPanel The class MainMenuPanel represents the main menu of the Bomberman game.
NewGamePanel The class NewGamePanel represents the new game menu.
